assessment_item.subject: Social Studies
assessment_item.title: ಮೈಸೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಒಡೆಯರ ಆಳ್ವಿಕೆ ಆರಂಭವಾದದ್ದು ಇವರ ಕಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಮೈಸೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಒಡೆಯರ ಆಳ್ವಿಕೆ ಆರಂಭವಾದದ್ದು ಇವರ ಕಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ರಾಜ ಒಡೆಯರು ಮತ್ತು ಚಿಕ್ಕದೇವರಾಜ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2923"},{"text":"

ಕಂಠೀರವ ನರಸರಾಜ ಮತ್ತು ಚಿಕ್ಕದೇವರಾಜ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2924"},{"text":"

ಯದುರಾಯ ಮತ್ತು ಕೃಷ್ಣರಾಯ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2934"},{"text":"

ಕೃಷ್ಣದೇವರಾಯ ಮತ್ತು ಮುಮ್ಮಡಿ ಕೃಷ್ಣರಾಜ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2939"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಮೈಸೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಒಡೆಯರ ಆಳ್ವಿಕೆ ಆರಂಭವಾದದ್ದು ಇವರ ಕಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ ","title":"ಮೈಸೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಒಡೆಯರ ಆಳ್ವಿಕೆ ಆರಂಭವಾದದ್ದು ಇವರ ಕಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
